description: This source file defines a workflow class 'HackerNewsReporter' that fetches top stories from Hacker News, processes them, and generates a report. It includes methods for retrieving top stories via the Hacker News API, and orchestrates the report generation using agents and tools.

classes.name: HackerNewsReporter
classes.description: A workflow class that fetches top Hacker News stories, processes them, and generates a report.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches top stories from Hacker News API and returns them as a JSON string.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the workflow: retrieves top stories, and generates a report.
